name: Token Transit
headline: Complete fare payment platform for public transportation
description:
Token Transit puts cities in the center of managing new mobility by providing a complete fare payment platform for public transportation.

Token Transit launched our mobile ticketing app in 2016. We now provide payments for transportation in over 200 cities across the United States and Canada with integration into the major third party trip planning apps such as Transit, Moovit and Google Maps.

founders.name: Morgan Kikuchi-Conbere, Founder/CEO
founders.description: City nerd that never learned how to drive. Now working with cities to improve transportation infrastructure.

founders.name: Ekate Kuznetsova, Founder/CTO
founders.description:
I love building and understanding complex systems, from distributed computer networks (Akamai, my first real job) to the infrastructure of American cities and towns (Token Transit). As the CTO of Token Transit, I balance our engineering resources against the needs of current and potential customers and try to feed as many birds with as few scones as possible.

Previously, I finished MIT in CS & Math, then worked for Akamai, Google and MeteorJS (currently: Apollo).

[Agency Log In](https://tokentransit.com/<https:/agency.tokentransit.com/>)[Contact Us](https://tokentransit.com/</company/contact>)
A COMPLETE FARE PAYMENTS PLATFORM
Modernizing Fare Collection
Make public transit the first choice by making it the easiest choice. Token Transit simplifies fare distribution, collection, and management for both transit agencies and riders alike. 
[Transit Agencies](https://tokentransit.com/</company/contact>)[Riders](https://tokentransit.com/</riders/download>)
![Multiple screens of the Token Transit mobile app displayed next to the Token Transit Validator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66a9319f9a099055594d5fdc/66e38b27775ecfa7901b8167_homepage%20hero%20-%20test%207%20\(1\).png)
## From small to large agencies, we scale perfectly to your needs.
[Fare DistributionWhether your riders prefer the convenience of a mobile ticket or the familiarity of a physical pass, use Token Transit to make your fares easily accessible. ](https://tokentransit.com/</agencies/fare-distribution>)[Fare CollectionWe support fare collection for agencies of all types. Regardless of your agency's hardware setup, we can find a solution that fits your agency's unique fare collection needs. ](https://tokentransit.com/</agencies/fare-collection>)[Administration & ManagementEasily manage your fares and collect data on sales, activation, and fare validation for both your administrative and planning needs.](https://tokentransit.com/</agencies/administration>)
## Fare collection of the future needs ‍scalable, flexible, and integrative technology to fully meet your riders where they are.

The flexible & integrated system
Token Transit is integrated with commonly used trip planning apps, third party fareboxes and faregates, and CAD/AVL systems.

A COMPLETE FARE PAYMENTS PLATFORM
Modernizing Fare Collection
Make public transit the first choice by making it the easiest choice. Token Transit simplifies fare distribution, collection, and management for both transit agencies and riders alike. 
Transit Agencies⟨14⟩Riders⟨3⟩
![Multiple screens of the Token Transit mobile app displayed next to the Token Transit Validator⟨20⟩].png)
## From small to large agencies, we scale perfectly to your needs.
Fare DistributionWhether your riders prefer the convenience of a mobile ticket or the familiarity of a physical pass, use Token Transit to make your fares easily accessible. ⟨8⟩Fare CollectionWe support fare collection for agencies of all types. Regardless of your agency's hardware setup, we can find a solution that fits your agency's unique fare collection needs. ⟨9⟩Administration & ManagementEasily manage your fares and collect data on sales, activation, and fare validation for both your administrative and planning needs.⟨10⟩
## Fare collection of the future needs ‍scalable, flexible, and integrative technology to fully meet your riders where they are.

## Customer Stories
Read how customer agencies are leveraging our technology to increase mobile fare adoption, lower cash collection, and promote Pass Programs to support community partners.

generated_description:
Token Transit is a pioneering fintech and govtech company, established in 2015 and based in San Francisco. Its mission revolves around making public transportation more accessible and efficient through a comprehensive fare payment platform. Launched in 2016, their mobile ticketing app has already made its mark across over 200 cities in the U.S. and Canada.

The platform is designed to put cities at the forefront of managing new mobility solutions. By facilitating easy fare payments, Token Transit empowers both riders and transit agencies, ensuring a seamless experience that resonates with our digital age. The app integrates smoothly with major trip planning tools like Google Maps, Transit, and Moovit, which means riders can access their transit options conveniently.

This company is not just another startup; it’s part of Y Combinator's Batch W17, showing it’s got the pedigree to back its ambitions. With a lean team of 12, led by Group Partner Michael Seibel, Token Transit is agile and ready to adapt to the evolving landscape of city mobility. 

Their services go beyond mere ticketing; they assist transit agencies in modernizing fare distribution and collection. Whether riders prefer mobile tickets or physical passes, Token Transit’s technology scales to the needs of agencies, from small organizations to large municipalities, making it a flexible solution for today's transit challenges.

If you want to learn more or tap into their services, you can explore their website at [Token Transit](https://tokentransit.com).
